title: Ignoramus Comœdia coram Regia Maiestate Iacobi Regis Angliæ. &c.
author: Ruggle, George, 1575-1622.
publisher: [Printed by Thomas Purfoot], impensis I. S[pencer],
notes: Partly based on: Porta, Giambattista della.  La trappolaria.
Colophon reads "Excudebat T.P. 1630."; printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
